briefdescription.para: Used for all administrative messages, such as an operator using a command.
Used for all announcement messages, such as informing users that a player has joined.
Gets the name of this server implementation.

simplesect.para: name of this server implementation

briefdescription.para: Gets the version string of this server implementation.

simplesect.para: version of this server implementation

briefdescription.para: Gets the Minecraft version that this server is running.

simplesect.para: version of Minecraft

briefdescription.para: Returns the primary logger associated with this server instance.

simplesect.para: Logger associated with this server

briefdescription.para: Gets the plugin manager for interfacing with plugins.

simplesect.para: a plugin manager for this Server instance

briefdescription.para: Gets a PluginCommand with the given name or alias.

parameterdescription.para: the name of the command to retrieve

simplesect.para: a plugin command if found, null otherwise

briefdescription.para: Gets a CommandSender for this server.

simplesect.para: a console command sender

briefdescription.para: Dispatches a command on this server, and executes it if found.

parameterdescription.para: the apparent sender of the command

simplesect.para: true if execution is successful, false otherwise

briefdescription.para: Gets the scheduler for managing scheduled events.

simplesect.para: a scheduling service for this server

briefdescription.para: Gets the server level.

simplesect.para: the server level

briefdescription.para: Gets a list of all currently online players.

simplesect.para: a list of currently online players.

briefdescription.para: Get the maximum amount of players which can login to this server.

simplesect.para: the amount of players this server allows

briefdescription.para: Set the maximum amount of players allowed to be logged in at once.

parameterdescription.para: The maximum amount of concurrent players

briefdescription.para: Gets the player with the given UUID.

parameterdescription.para: UUID of the player to retrieve

simplesect.para: a player object if one was found, null otherwise

briefdescription.para: Gets the player with the exact given name, case insensitive.

parameterdescription.para: Exact name of the player to retrieve

simplesect.para: a player object if one was found, null otherwise

briefdescription.para: Shutdowns the server, stopping everything.
Reloads the server configuration, functions, scripts and plugins.
Reload only the Minecraft data for the server.

detaileddescription.para: This includes functions and script files from all behaviour packs.

briefdescription.para: Broadcasts the specified message to every user with the given permission name.

parameterdescription.para: the required permission Permissibles must have to receive the broadcast

briefdescription.para: Broadcasts the specified message to every user with permission endstone.broadcast.user.
Checks the current thread against the expected primary server thread.

simplesect.para: true if the current thread matches the expected primary thread, false otherwise

briefdescription.para: Gets the primary Scoreboard controlled by the server.

detaileddescription.para: This Scoreboard is saved by the server, is affected by the /scoreboard command, and is the scoreboard shown by default to players. This will only exist after the level has been loaded.

simplesect.para: the default server scoreboard

briefdescription.para: Creates a new Scoreboard to be tracked by the server.

detaileddescription.para: This will not be saved by the server and is not affected by the /scoreboard command.

simplesect.para: the newly created Scoreboard

briefdescription.para: Gets the current milliseconds per tick (MSPT).

simplesect.para: The average current of milliseconds per tick.

briefdescription.para: Gets the average milliseconds per tick (MSPT).

simplesect.para: The average number of milliseconds per tick.

briefdescription.para: Gets the current ticks per second (TPS).

simplesect.para: The current ticks per second

briefdescription.para: Gets the average ticks per second (TPS).

simplesect.para: The average ticks per second

briefdescription.para: Gets the current tick usage of the server.

simplesect.para: The current tick usage in percentage.

briefdescription.para: Gets the average tick usage of the server.

simplesect.para: The average tick usage in percentage.

memberdef.argsstring: (std::string title, BarColor color, BarStyle style) const =0
memberdef.name: createBossBar

briefdescription.para: Creates a boss bar instance to display to players. The progress defaults to 1.0.

parameterdescription.para: the title of the boss bar
the color of the boss bar
the style of the boss bar

simplesect.para: the created boss bar

memberdef.argsstring: (std::string title, BarColor color, BarStyle style, std::vector< BarFlag > flags) const =0
memberdef.name: createBossBar

briefdescription.para: Creates a boss bar instance to display to players. The progress defaults to 1.0.

parameterdescription.para: the title of the boss bar
the color of the boss bar
the style of the boss bar
a list of flags to set on the boss bar

simplesect.para: the created boss bar

briefdescription.para: Creates a new BlockData instance for the specified block type, with all properties initialized to defaults.

simplesect.para: new data instance

briefdescription.para: Creates a new BlockData instance for the specified block type, with all properties initialized to defaults, except for those provided in data.

simplesect.para: new data instance

briefdescription.para: Gets the start time of the server.

simplesect.para: The start time of the serverã€‚

briefdescription.para: Represents a server implementation.
